fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Protect someone at night depending on how many vowels are in their role's name.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
1 vowel - Basic Defense
2 vowels - Powerful Defense
3 vowels - Invincible Defense
4 vowels - Overprotective Defense
5+ vowels - Nothing can kill your target, this ability cannot fail or be bypassed.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
